timeline.bodyText:
Is this constructor used somewhere? (I couldn't find it in the changelog, but maybe I'm missing something).
If not then, the mode and shouldUseDefaultMode variables can be deleted as well.
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText: No, I just thought I could leave it in, if someone decides to create a specific type of a library. Just a thought...
replies.author: calixtus

replies.bodyText: I'm not a big fan of unused/dead code...
replies.author: tobiasdiez
